instructions: Create a course directory. Copy/note its full path (e.g.- /home/xyz/workdir/OS).
Download the Makefile by clicking on the button below.
Move the downloaded Makefile to the course directory you created.
Open a terminal inside the course directory.
Run 'make start-xv6'.
Every time you need to run xv6 after this, you need to run 'make run-xv6'.
